summary: The Ethanol for America Act of 2025 mandates the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to finalize a proposed rule regarding E15 fuel dispenser labeling and compatibility with underground storage tanks. The bill specifies labeling requirements, deems existing underground storage tanks compliant, and outlines compatibility standards for future installations with up to 100% ethanol blends. It aims to increase the use of ethanol as a fuel source by clarifying and streamlining related regulatory requirements.
